divs: Sighting Detailshi my name is william haddox and I would like to report a ufo sightingit happened at hargus lake the night of the total lunar eclipes.it was a small amber color dot in the sky at first I though it was anairplane but it went in reverse and side to side then it hovered for afew minutes the took off very fast but not in a stright line more of in and outthan a straight line
